abstract.t: In discussions about PMIPv6-MIPv6 interactions in NETLMM WG, scenarioC describes the case of collocation of LMA and HA function. In thiscase a PMIP network emulates the "home link" for MNs using MIPv6.This document argues that even when LMA and HA functions areCollocated they MUST be treated as logically separate entities. Inparticular this draft argues that PMIP BCEs MUST NOT overwrite MIPv6BCEs and vice versa.
